61.eng-name: Virtues and Merits of the Prophet (pbuh) and his Companions

hadiths.text: Narrated Anas:I have never touched silk or Dibaj (i.e. thick silk) softer than the palm of the Prophet (ﷺ) nor have I smelt a perfume nicer than the sweat of the Prophet

chapter.ara-name: باب صِفَةِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم
